en.name: SIG Sauer P320 9x19 pistol
en.description: The Sig Sauer P320 is a modular, striker-fired semi-automatic pistol known for its versatility and accuracy. It's modular design and durable construction lead to its adoption by the U.S. military and various law enforcement and military agencies globally. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.

en.name: SIG Sauer SIG Sauer P320 9x19 3.9 inch barrel
en.description: Component for the modular SIG Sauer P320 9x19 pistol platform. Barrel designed to balance recoil and ergonomics for various configurations.

en.description: Component for the modular SIG Sauer P320 9x19 pistol platform. Barrel designed to balance recoil and ergonomics for various configurations.

en.name: SIG Sauer P320 standard trigger
en.description: Component for the modular SIG Sauer P320 9x19 pistol platform. Trigger unit tailored for consistent striker-fired operation.

en.name: SIG Sauer P320 9x19 17-round magazine (Black)
en.description: Standard-issue steel magazine for the SIG P320 chambered in 9x19mm. Holds 17 rounds with a reliable feed spring and polymer baseplate.

en.name: SIG Sauer P320 standard rear sight
en.description: Factory-standard rear sight for the SIG P320 series. Steel construction with a clean, low-profile notch design for fast sight alignment and target acquisition.

en.name: SIG Sauer P320 standard front sight
en.description: Factory front sight for the SIG P320, featuring a steel post with a high-visibility dot for quick target acquisition.

en.name: SIG Sauer P320 4.7 inch frame (Black)
en.description: Full-size polymer grip module for the SIG P320, built to house the 4.7 inch slide and barrel. Features an ergonomic design with aggressive texturing for enhanced control under recoil. Flat Dark Earth version.

en.name: SIG Sauer P320 4.7 inch frame (FDE)
en.description: Full-size polymer grip module for the SIG P320, built to house the 4.7 inch slide and barrel. Features an ergonomic design with aggressive texturing for enhanced control under recoil.

en.name: SIG Sauer P320 3.9 inch frame (Black)
en.description: Sub-Compact polymer grip module for the SIG P320, built to house the 3.9 inch slide and barrel. Features an ergonomic design with aggressive texturing for enhanced control under recoil.

en.name: SIG Sauer P320 3.9 inch frame (FDE)
en.description: Sub-Compact polymer grip module for the SIG P320, built to house the 3.9 inch slide and barrel. Features an ergonomic design with aggressive texturing for enhanced control under recoil. Flat Dark Earth version.
